author: not.rithik
content:
I'm not sure if this is the right channel for this message, so please excuse me if it isn't, and direct me to the correct one.

Hello, I came across EF's DeFi Protocol Specialist vacancy and I believe possess the skillset and experience required to fulfill the daily requirements of this role. I'd like connect with someone to better understand the needs of this role beyond what's stated on the job portal, and put forth some public work to go beyond the requirements for the role. Is it possible to make this happen?

For more context about me - I have deployed my own defi protocol and backend services, written articles analyzing defi protocols' economics, l2 architectures and solidity programming security practices based on anonymized insights gained through my experience.
